code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ReturnsAndRefund=function ReturnsAndRefund(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"text-general",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Returns and Refunds Policy 1. Who is Divine Collections? Divine Collections, having its registered office at 2nd floor, Mamatha Residency, Shree Anant Nagar, Bengaluru \u2013 560100, Karnataka, India (\u201Cwe\u201D, \u201Cus\u201D or \u201Cour\u201D) is managing and operating the websites divine-collections.herokuapp.com thereof (Divine Collections referred to as the \u201CPlatforms\u201D) through which it inter alia facilitates the sale and purchase of a diverse range of fashion, home, and other products listed on the Platforms from time to time and other products (\u201CProducts\u201D) to the users of the Platforms (\u201CUser\u201D or \u201CUsers\u201D or \u201Cyou\u201D or \u201Cyour\u201D). 2. What is this Cancellation, Return and Refund Policy? 2.1. In keeping with Divine Collections\u2019s goal of ensuring User satisfaction, this cancellation, return and refund Policy (\u201CCancellation, Return and Refund Policy\u201D), together with the terms of use at www.Divine Collections.com/help/termsAndCondition, sets out Divine Collections\u2019s procedures and policies in accepting: (a) Product cancellations before the Product is delivered to a User; or (b) Product returns, once a Product has been delivered to a User after purchase from the Platforms. Any return or cancellation of Products by Users shall be governed by and subject to the terms and conditions set out under this Cancellation, Return and Refund Policy. 2.2. Users are required to peruse and understand the terms of this Cancellation, Return and Refund Policy. If you do not agree to the terms contained in this Cancellation, Return and Refund Policy, you are advised not to accept the Terms of Use and may forthwith leave and stop using the Platforms. The terms contained in this Cancellation, Return and Refund Policy shall be accepted without modification and you agree to be bound by the terms contained herein by initiating a request for purchase of Product(s) on the Platforms. 3. Terms of cancellation 3.1. Cancellation before dispatch. 3.1.1. A User is permitted to fully or partially cancel orders prior to its dispatch from Divine Collections. 3.1.2. Upon successfully placing an order on the Platforms and after Divine Collections has successfully handed over the Product(s) to its Logistic Partner (as defined in the Delivery Policy), the User will receive a unique tracking identity number, which will enable the User in tracking the status of delivery of the purchased Products. 3.1.3. Prior to the dispatch of the purchased Products, should the User decide to cancel the purchase, the User can do so by referencing the unique tracking identity number received by the User and requesting Divine Collections to process a cancellation by sending an email to customercare@Divine Collections.com. 3.1.4. Refund. In all events of cancellation prior to the dispatch of the purchased Products, Divine Collections shall initiate refunds within 2 (two) business days from the date on which it received the request from the User. 3.1.5. In case of cash on delivery, the refund will reflect in the User\u2019s bank account and/or the User\u2019s Divine Collections Wallet (as defined in the Fees and Payments Policy) within such reasonable time (subject to the policies of the User\u2019s bank in case of bank account/credit card refunds) from the date on which Divine Collections initiates the refund. All refunds, except for refund to Divine Collections Wallet, shall be subject to applicable charges as may be deducted by the User\u2019s bank. 3.1.6. In case of payment made through prepaid mode through any channel, the refund will be made to the original mode of payment. All refunds shall be subject to applicable charges as may be deducted by the User\u2019s bank. 3.2. Cancellation after dispatch. We do not accept post-dispatch cancellation of orders."})});};export default ReturnsAndRefund;

sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const ReturnsAndRefund: React.FC = () => { return (

Returns and Refunds Policy 1. Who is Divine Collections? Divine Collections, having its registered office at 2nd floor, Mamatha Residency, Shree Anant Nagar, Bengaluru – 560100, Karnataka, India (“we”, “us” or “our”) is managing and operating the websites divine-collections.herokuapp.com thereof (Divine Collections referred to as the “Platforms”) through which it inter alia facilitates the sale and purchase of a diverse range of fashion, home, and other products listed on the Platforms from time to time and other products (“Products”) to the users of the Platforms (“User” or “Users” or “you” or “your”). 2. What is this Cancellation, Return and Refund Policy? 2.1. In keeping with Divine Collections’s goal of ensuring User satisfaction, this cancellation, return and refund Policy (“Cancellation, Return and Refund Policy”), together with the terms of use at www.Divine Collections.com/help/termsAndCondition, sets out Divine Collections’s procedures and policies in accepting: (a) Product cancellations before the Product is delivered to a User; or (b) Product returns, once a Product has been delivered to a User after purchase from the Platforms. Any return or cancellation of Products by Users shall be governed by and subject to the terms and conditions set out under this Cancellation, Return and Refund Policy. 2.2. Users are required to peruse and understand the terms of this Cancellation, Return and Refund Policy. If you do not agree to the terms contained in this Cancellation, Return and Refund Policy, you are advised not to accept the Terms of Use and may forthwith leave and stop using the Platforms. The terms contained in this Cancellation, Return and Refund Policy shall be accepted without modification and you agree to be bound by the terms contained herein by initiating a request for purchase of Product(s) on the Platforms. 3. Terms of cancellation 3.1. Cancellation before dispatch. 3.1.1. A User is permitted to fully or partially cancel orders prior to its dispatch from Divine Collections. 3.1.2. Upon successfully placing an order on the Platforms and after Divine Collections has successfully handed over the Product(s) to its Logistic Partner (as defined in the Delivery Policy), the User will receive a unique tracking identity number, which will enable the User in tracking the status of delivery of the purchased Products. 3.1.3. Prior to the dispatch of the purchased Products, should the User decide to cancel the purchase, the User can do so by referencing the unique tracking identity number received by the User and requesting Divine Collections to process a cancellation by sending an email to customercare@Divine Collections.com. 3.1.4. Refund. In all events of cancellation prior to the dispatch of the purchased Products, Divine Collections shall initiate refunds within 2 (two) business days from the date on which it received the request from the User. 3.1.5. In case of cash on delivery, the refund will reflect in the User’s bank account and/or the User’s Divine Collections Wallet (as defined in the Fees and Payments Policy) within such reasonable time (subject to the policies of the User’s bank in case of bank account/credit card refunds) from the date on which Divine Collections initiates the refund. All refunds, except for refund to Divine Collections Wallet, shall be subject to applicable charges as may be deducted by the User’s bank. 3.1.6. In case of payment made through prepaid mode through any channel, the refund will be made to the original mode of payment. All refunds shall be subject to applicable charges as may be deducted by the User’s bank. 3.2. Cancellation after dispatch. We do not accept post-dispatch cancellation of orders.

) } export default ReturnsAndRefund;
